reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and appreciate its thick material, with one noting it's made of cozy flannel fabric. They describe it as comfortable and warm, and like its design, with one mentioning the ties on the neck and bust are particularly attractive. The length receives mixed feedback, with several customers finding it too short, and opinions about quality are divided between those who say it's good and those w

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is a dream for Christmas
items.body: This dress is gorgeous! It is a brushed flannel material so it will be super warm closer to winter. Just beautiful when you put it on. And it fits like a dream. I absolutely loved this dress, but it was too small because my chest is too large Read more
items.author: Carla Baker

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and ugly.
items.body: So cheap and ugly. Lol. I actually laughed when I opened it. Read more
items.author: JamieINalaska

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best holiday dress!
items.body: An amazing holiday dress! Come to right above the knees, quality thick material. Ties on the neck and bust are so cute. Colors are vibrant and sleeves come all the way to the hands. Love this dress! Read more
items.author: Dana

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality; arrived too late
items.body: The picture is an accurate display, especially if you are not well endowed. The material is a well quality and warm. Unfortunately, it arrives too late for my event. Read more
items.author: SR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: Runs a little small, size up if in between Read more
items.author: Morgan Kahl

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Fit is all wrong
items.body: The material is thick and warm, but cheap looking for being over $40. Definitely not worth the price. The sizing and shape is so off, it’s weirdly tight around the shoulders, so when you lift your arms there’s no stretch. Since there’s no give when you lift and it’s tight under the breast, your skirt just lifts up and you risk flashing your bum (and im a petite person!). The measurements just don’t seem made for a person or align with the size guide lol I may have just recieved a defective dress though… If you size up it MAY be better. It’s not totally unflattering, it’s just obviously a cheap fast fashion dress that isn’t portioned right. Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfy
items.body: Only complaint would be it was a little large in the chest area! But super comfy and great material! Pockets would've beeb great lol Read more
items.author: Frances Sipper

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Smelly and massive
items.body: Smelled like mildew and was way way oversized Read more
items.author: Evelina

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Red Plaid, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
